trans-unit.source: Efficient Use of Data Types (Visual Basic) | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: 有效率地使用資料類型 (Visual Basic) |Microsoft 文件

trans-unit.source: Efficient Use of Data Types (Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: 有效率地使用資料類型 (Visual Basic)

trans-unit.source: Undeclared variables and variables declared without a data type are assigned the `Object` data type.
trans-unit.target: 未宣告的變數和不具資料型別宣告的變數指派`Object`資料型別。

trans-unit.source: This makes it easy to write programs quickly, but it can cause them to execute more slowly.
trans-unit.target: 這樣可以容易撰寫的程式速度快，但它可能會使程式執行速度變慢。

trans-unit.source: Strong Typing
trans-unit.target: 強型別

trans-unit.source: Specifying data types for all your variables is known as *strong typing*.
trans-unit.target: 指定所有變數的資料型別稱為*強型別*。

trans-unit.source: Using strong typing has several advantages:
trans-unit.target: 使用強型別有下列優點︰

trans-unit.source: It enables IntelliSense support for your variables.
trans-unit.target: 它可讓您的變數的 IntelliSense 支援。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to see their properties and other members as you type in the code.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您查看其屬性和其他成員，當您輸入程式碼中。

trans-unit.source: It takes advantage of compiler type checking.
trans-unit.target: 它會利用編譯器型別檢查。

trans-unit.source: This catches statements that can fail at run time due to errors such as overflow.
trans-unit.target: 這會攔截可能會在執行階段，因為例如溢位錯誤而失敗的陳述式。

trans-unit.source: It also catches calls to methods on objects that do not support them.
trans-unit.target: 也會對方法的呼叫攔截並不支援的物件。

trans-unit.source: It results in faster execution of your code.
trans-unit.target: 這樣可以更快地執行您的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Most Efficient Data Types
trans-unit.target: 最有效率的資料類型

trans-unit.source: For variables that never contain fractions, the integral data types are more efficient than the nonintegral types.
trans-unit.target: 對於絕對不能包含分數的變數，整數類資料類型會比非整數類型有效。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)], `Integer` and `UInteger` are the most efficient numeric types.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)]，`Integer`和`UInteger`是最有效率的數字類型。

trans-unit.source: For fractional numbers, `Double` is the most efficient data type, because the processors on current platforms perform floating-point operations in double precision.
trans-unit.target: 小數的數字，`Double`是最有效率的資料類型，因為目前平台上的處理器執行雙精度浮點數運算。

trans-unit.source: However, operations with `Double` are not as fast as with the integral types such as `Integer`.
trans-unit.target: 不過，作業`Double`速度與整數類資料型別，例如`Integer`。

trans-unit.source: Specifying Data Type
trans-unit.target: 指定資料型別

trans-unit.source: Use the [Dim Statement](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/dim-statement.md) to declare a variable of a specific type.
trans-unit.target: 使用[Dim 陳述式](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/dim-statement.md)宣告特定型別的變數。

trans-unit.source: You can simultaneously specify its access level by using the [Public](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/public.md), [Protected](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/protected.md), [Friend](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/friend.md), or [Private](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/private.md) keyword, as in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用，以同時指定其存取層級[公用](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/public.md)，[受保護](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/protected.md)， [Friend](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/friend.md)，或[私人](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/private.md)關鍵字，如下列範例所示。

trans-unit.source: Character Conversion
trans-unit.target: 字元轉換

trans-unit.source: The `AscW` and `ChrW` functions operate in Unicode.
trans-unit.target: `AscW`和`ChrW`函式會以 Unicode 作業。

trans-unit.source: You should use them in preference to `Asc` and `Chr`, which must translate into and out of Unicode.
trans-unit.target: 您應該使用這些優先`Asc`和`Chr`，這必須在傳入和傳出 Unicode 轉譯。

trans-unit.target: 另請參閱
